ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue as stated by petitioner is:
(1) Does Section 319 of the Pennsylvania Workers’ Compensation Act, 77 P.S. § 671, allow the employer/insurer to step into the shoes of the insured employee to subrogate against the tortfeasor?
